job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongstrongSoftware Engineerstrongstrong  pptldr An innovative seedstage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Software Engineer fullstack to join our team and help design and build a greenfield cybersecurity product using bleeding edge technologybr strongOur techstack and RampD culture strongp  pAs this is a greenfield application we do not have all the details ironed out emyouem will help us do that However we do know we will be using p  p nbsp nbsp  Nodejs backend p  p nbsp nbsp  React  Vue  Angular frontend p  p nbsp nbsp  TypeScript on both p  p nbsp nbsp  Serverless kubernetes AWS p  p nbsp nbsp  Neo4j MongoDB p  pWe will be putting a high emphasis on p  p nbsp nbsp  Honing your skills p  p nbsp nbsp  SOLID design principles p  p nbsp nbsp  Highly maintainable and testable code p  p nbsp nbsp  Nonblocking automatic CICD pipeline p  p nbsp nbsp  Letting developers develop and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings procedures and rules p  p nbsp nbsp  Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product p  p nbsp nbsp  Opensource use and contribute p  strongstrongWhat do we expect you to bring to the tablestrongstrong  pWe believe that for every highly functioning relationship there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a winwin situation for all p  pOur key requirements are p  p nbsp nbsp  Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it p  p nbsp nbsp  Assume best intentions  we know we will p  p nbsp nbsp  Drive to build something amazing p  p nbsp nbsp  Be excited about data and coding p  p nbsp nbsp  Have strong opinions but hold them loosely p  pnbsp ppstrongstrongWhat will you be doingstrongstrongbr ppAs a seedstage team member you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process working directly with the other team members and leadership we have a very flat structure In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the companyp
